title: Losing LP due to afkers
body: The amount of times i've lost my promos, got demoted, and just simply lost LP due to it being a 4v5 is too damn much. Like man how is it fair that they have an adc and we don't? Or a mid laner, or a tank. It frustrates me that I go 17/3 but we lose because we can't win teamfights. So can riot make it that if you have an AFK on your team, you don't lose lp. It seems fair to me.

replies.body: Unfortunently implementing such a feature would just cause people to want to abuse it, which would result in creating more people going afk
